name: Sand Witch Adventures
description:
Sand Witch Adventures is a roguelike game with bullet-hell elements.
Cursed lands full of undead are fraught with wealth and knowledge for the young
witches. She decides to definitely go on this adventure, despite
no matter what. Sandstorms, icy deserts, dense forests, red lands - all these
locations will become more and more difficult to overcome.



Features:
- The system of pumping from race to race.
- Several unique biomes.
- Random generation of levels.
- Several types of enemies and their attacks.

Ready to travel with a young witch? Then go ahead!
